text: we were right at the very front to the
left of the stage right at the the end
of the barrier and what did you think
was happening when you first heard the
sounds I knew it was gunfire I knew we
were under attack did you I mean I think
a lot of people thought it was part of
the stage sure they inspire works I
didn't feel like that I knew it was a
gun going off what did you do so I just
looked over I seen bullets hit the
bottom of the stage and my friend she
sort of smiled and looked like a lot of
people were doing in the confusion and
then instantly there was a second blast
of bullets at this point the the band
looked very confused people sort of let
out a gasp and they automatically ducked
down and I just said to Christine that's
gunfire run get over here and we just we
just ran and where where did you had to
we were about ten feet away from the
exit that would have if we had gone left
that exit would have taken us out into
the street we went right into the
backstage area which is just you know
sort of maze of different rooms and and
ended up where first of all we ran into
saw this larger room it sort of looked
like an equipment room and there was a
little alcove and we just thought get
your shoes off we'll be able to run
quicker we had boots on so we were
trying to get our shoes off and we were
so cowering in this little alcove and
there was another door we tried it was
the door to a cupboard there was another
one we tried it was locked and then the
third one we ran down a couple of stairs
tried that door and it opened and we
just ran in it was
Celer and we then realized we were
trapped and could you still hear what
was going on in the venue above you it
was just a stampede and screaming and
gunfire and of course you wouldn't know
if you'd necessarily got to a place of
safety you because you don't know where
the gunman will go after that no nothing
felt safe at that woman and time we were
just we went to run back out of the room
we were like silly to stay in here we
can't see in here we're trapped
get out and as we went to run out the
door swung open and two other guys came
running in we were just like no and then
we realized they were in the same
situation as us and the leader shut the
door the room had one of these automatic
sensor lights that just kept flickering
on and off and we couldn't get it to go
out we thought we would have to smash it
with like something our shoes or
something and one of the Italian guys
actually managed to get off and we just
ran to the very back of the cellar and
just ground ourselves into the smallest
space and just waited and darkness
